item.title: Sunday Latte - 03 MAY 2020
item.description: Guess maximum possible loss and profit made in Nifty this year? Answers at the bottom. Here are the intereting things I came across the web last week: Why are stock markets when world is going down? Link Markets are smart in punishing the impacted companies(Exxon) and rewarding others(Amazon) Market is optimistic which doesnt tie well with reality yet Can you trust Covid19 models? Link Models are tough especially when input is dynamic A small change of R_0, viral spread rate, from 2.

item.title: Sunday Latte - 26 April 2020
item.description: Here are few good articles from last week readings Career advice for people with bad luck Politics emerge when the players believe the game is zero sum. Try not to learn the wrong habits. Failure I call living Give a full read, worth it How to overcome mental laziness If you have already reached reading till this, you don't need them :) Few gems from the conversation:
